sightings.name: The Shire
sightings.clue: A glint of gold was seen near a Hobbit-hole. The thief Baggins lives there! We knows it!

sightings.name: Misty Mountains
sightings.clue: Deep in the caves, where the goblinses creep, a lost treasure waits. Our home... our Precious!

sightings.name: Gladden Fields
sightings.clue: In the murky riverbed... that's where we found it! Our birthday present! It might have returned.

sightings.name: Mirkwood
sightings.clue: The shiny Elves caught us here! Maybe they took it from us? Nasty Elves!

sightings.name: Cirith Ungol
sightings.clue: We led the hobbitses to Her lair! A perfect plan... the Precious was almost ours again!

sightings.name: Mount Doom, Mordor
sightings.clue: The fire... it took it! But did it? Did it really? We must check the cracks... yes, precious, we must!
